title: How to Kill the Tyrant in Resident Evil

steps.headline: Run away to put a distance between you and the Tyrant.
Aim and fire the Magnum at him when you get to the end of the big straight.
steps.description: Luckily, he only walks in this encounter.

steps.headline: Retreat further and then fire if he gets close to you.
steps.description: He should go down in no more than 6 shots.

steps.headline: If you killed Barry use his BARRY'S MAGNUM or just use the SELF-DEFENCE GUN
Shoot off the signal rockets to signal to Brad where you are.
Watch the cutscene where your partner(s?)
steps.description: comes through the elevator, and then the Tyrant breaks through the ground to crash the party.

steps.headline: Shoot him with the Magnum until you have done enough damage.
steps.description: If he heads toward one of your partners, shoot him to divert his attention before he kills them.

steps.headline: Dodge him whenever he runs straight at you to claw you.
steps.description: If you are hit with his claw, you will receive damage and stay on the ground for a few seconds.

steps.headline: Grab the Rocket Launcher from the center of the helipad when Brad drops it.
Aim and fire the Rocket Launcher at the Tyrant.
steps.description: If he deflects it, try again, you've got four chances.

tyn: Fully loaded .357 Magnum with all the extra reloads you have
Self defense gun (remake) and at least 3 defense items (remake)
Rest of your inventory filled with powerful healing items
text: First Encounter Run away to put a distance between you and the Tyrant.  Aim and fire the Magnum at him when you get to the end of the big straight. Luckily, he only walks in this encounter. Retreat further and then fire if he gets close to you. He should go down in no more than 6 shots. If you killed Barry use his BARRY'S MAGNUM or just use the SELF-DEFENCE GUN  Second Encounter Shoot off the signal rockets to signal to Brad where you are.  Watch the cutscene where your partner(s?) comes through the elevator, and then the Tyrant breaks through the ground to crash the party. Shoot him with the Magnum until you have done enough damage. If he heads toward one of your partners, shoot him to divert his attention before he kills them. Dodge him whenever he runs straight at you to claw you. If you are hit with his claw, you will receive damage and stay on the ground for a few seconds. Grab the Rocket Launcher from the center of the helipad when Brad drops it.  Equip the Rocket Launcher.  Aim and fire the Rocket Launcher at the Tyrant. If he deflects it, try again, you've got four chances.
sentences: First Encounter Run away to put a distance between you and the Tyrant.
Aim and fire the Magnum at him when you get to the end of the big straight.
Luckily, he only walks in this encounter.
Retreat further and then fire if he gets close to you.
He should go down in no more than 6 shots.
If you killed Barry use his BARRY'S MAGNUM or just use the SELF-DEFENCE GUN  Second Encounter Shoot off the signal rockets to signal to Brad where you are.
Watch the cutscene where your partner(s?)
comes through the elevator, and then the Tyrant breaks through the ground to crash the party.
Shoot him with the Magnum until you have done enough damage.
If he heads toward one of your partners, shoot him to divert his attention before he kills them.
Dodge him whenever he runs straight at you to claw you.
If you are hit with his claw, you will receive damage and stay on the ground for a few seconds.
Grab the Rocket Launcher from the center of the helipad when Brad drops it.
Aim and fire the Rocket Launcher at the Tyrant.
If he deflects it, try again, you've got four chances.
